title: datalad install doesn't handle paths (urls?) with spaces correctly
body:
a dump of struggle, but in general -- seems to not get it done and even removes empty submodule directory if existed before... quite ugly ;)

```
$> git co 'Cleveland CCF'
(venv-tests)2 10405.....................................:Wed 10 Aug 2016 01:35:05 PM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000[master]git
$> git st
On branch master
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/master'.
nothing to commit, working directory clean
(venv-tests)2 10406.....................................:Wed 10 Aug 2016 01:35:07 PM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000[master]git
$> datalad install 'Cleveland CCF'
2016-08-10 13:35:14,218 [INFO   ] Installing /mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland CCF (install.py:378)
2016-08-10 13:35:14,350 [WARNING] Parsed version of URL 'http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland%20CCF/.git' differs from original 'http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland CCF/.git' (network.py:391)
2016-08-10 13:35:14,350 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland CCF> from http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland CCF/.git (install.py:378)
2016-08-10 13:35:14,445 [WARNING] Parsed version of URL 'http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/./Cleveland%20CCF/.git' differs from original 'http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/./Cleveland CCF/.git' (network.py:391)
2016-08-10 13:35:14,445 [INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000/Cleveland CCF> from http://datasets.datalad.org/indi/fcon1000/./Cleveland CCF/.git (install.py:378)
Nothing was installed
changes on filesystem:                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 Cleveland CCF | 1 -
(venv-tests)2 10407.....................................:Wed 10 Aug 2016 01:35:14 PM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000[master]git
$> ls Cle
(venv-tests)2 10407 ->1.....................................:Wed 10 Aug 2016 01:35:18 PM EDT:.
(git)smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/test-crawled2/all-3/indi/fcon1000[master]git
$> git status
On branch master
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/master'.
Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add/rm <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)

        deleted:    Cleveland CCF

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")
changes on filesystem:                                                                                                                                                                                                            
 Cleveland CCF | 1 -
```
